title: Mercy
description:
I didn't choose this.
But here I am: at Cambridge Prep.Surrounded by rich, entitled brats who all bow down to the three boys they call the Kings of Cambridge.Three boys so devastatingly handsome, but oh so cruel.Ace, Hunter and Ricardo.The boy who broke my heart three years ago, and his two best friends.Ace summoned me so that they could toy with me, and then...... destroy me.But they underestimated me.I may be broken, but I'm not ready to fall apart.I've survived worse.Years ago, he told me he was the King.He called me Queen.And I'm ready to claim my throne.


Mercy is a reverse harem high school bully romance. This is book one in the series and features some language, dark themes and sexual scenes. Ends with a cliffhanger, but I promise it's worth it!

What are you waiting for? Dive in and meet your next book boyfriends! #whychoose
author: Avery Moore
